title: Voicemailer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose one person each night to Voicemail.
Attributes.
- Voicemailed targets cannot talk through text messages or react during the day.
- Voicemailed targets can only send voice messages through the mobile app.
- You can hear private messages.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose the Mafia.

desc:
Post 5098
*Here to ruin your day. And your vocal chords.*
